juntúul: Ak xu'uk'il: kik meentik u k'ajóolta'al le yóok'ol kaab tumen tuláakal máak yéetel ka béeyak u t'aano'o ichil tuláakal t'aano'ob.
a: Our mission: to enable everyone, everywhere to understand the world and express themselves across languages.

juntúul: Ak xu'uk'il: kik oganisartik tuláakal informasion way yóok'ol kaabe' yo'osal beyo' séeba'an u kaxta'al ti'al k'e'ebéetkunsbil.
a: Our mission: to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful.

juntúul: Nib óolal ikil a pa'atik ak ilik yo'osal le kun túuxtbilo'
